Your account has been permanently banned for repeatedly or severely violating our Code of Conduct. The specific reason given was: $1. If you believe that you were banned in error, you can go to http://acadiverse.magizile.xom/account/appeal to appeal this ban.
Your account has been banned until $1 for the following reason: $2.
You may not perform this action as you are currently banned from sending chat messages/PMing users who are not moderators. Please contact us if you believe that this is a mistake.

Are you sure you wish to block this user? They will not be able to send you any PMs or comment on your submissions, and they will also be automatically blocked from any chats that you owm!
Are you sure you wish to block this user from this chat? They will not be able to send any more chat messages!
This action could not be performed because you have been blocked from this chat. Please contact one of the chat moderators if you believe that this is in error.

This action could not be perfoemed as the chat has been deleted. Chats can be deleted by the owner, or they can be deleted by an Acadiverse moderator or an admin for violating the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct.
Failed to connect to the server. Please check your Internet connection. Our servers may also be down; if this is the case, please wait a few minutes and/or try again later.
Are you sure you wish to delete this message? This can NOT be undone!

You cannot PM this user because they have blocked you.
You cannot PM this user because they have chosen not to receive PMs from users who are not moderators.
This action could not be performed because the chat is private and you have not been given the appropriate permissions to access it.
You have been logged out as there is a problem with your credentials.
You are about to report $1 for the following reason: $2. Please note that reports are taken very seriously, and that sending false reports may result in a ban. Proceed with reporfting this user?

This action could not be performed because your message contains a racial slur. You have earned a strike for this action. If you attempt to send such messages $1 more times, you will be banned from chatting/sending PMs.

This action could not be performed because your message contains bad language or suggestive content. You have earned a strike for this action. If you attempt to send such messages $1 more times, you will be banned from chatting/sending PMs.
You have been automatically banned from sending chat/PMs because you have attempted to send a chat message/PM with swear words or racial/cultural slurs in it too many times.
